scripts.validate:modules: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const root=process.cwd();const modulesDir=path.join(root,'modules');if(!fs.existsSync(modulesDir)){console.error('Missing modules directory:',modulesDir);process.exit(1);}for(const entry of fs.readdirSync(modulesDir,{withFileTypes:true})){if(!entry.isDirectory()) continue;const pkg=path.join(modulesDir,entry.name,'package.json');if(!fs.existsSync(pkg)) continue;const data=fs.readFileSync(pkg,'utf8');JSON.parse(data);}console.log('Module package.json files valid.');"
scripts.preflight:eas: npm run validate:modules && npx expo-doctor && npm test
